      • test_delete_insert__insertInto_01

        public void test_delete_insert__insertInto_01()
                                       throws org.openrdf.query.MalformedQueryException,
                                              TokenMgrError,
                                              ParseException
        INSERT INTO named solution set (bigdata extension). 
         PREFIX dc:  
 PREFIX xsd: 
 
 INSERT INTO %cached_solution_set 
 WHERE
   { GRAPH  
        { ?book dc:date ?date .
          FILTER ( ?date > "1970-01-01T00:00:00-02:00"^^xsd:dateTime )
          ?book ?p ?v
   } }
        Throws:
        org.openrdf.query.MalformedQueryException
        TokenMgrError
        ParseException
        See Also:
        (SPARQL Cache)

      • test_delete_insert__deleteFrom_01

        public void test_delete_insert__deleteFrom_01()
                                       throws org.openrdf.query.MalformedQueryException,
                                              TokenMgrError,
                                              ParseException
        DELETE FROM named solution set (bigdata extension). 
         PREFIX dc:  
 PREFIX xsd: 
 
 DELETE FROM %cached_solution_set 
 WHERE
   { GRAPH  
        { ?book dc:date ?date .
          FILTER ( ?date > "1970-01-01T00:00:00-02:00"^^xsd:dateTime )
          ?book ?p ?v
   } }
        Throws:
        org.openrdf.query.MalformedQueryException
        TokenMgrError
        ParseException
        See Also:
        (SPARQL Cache)

      • test_create_solutions_silent_params

        public void test_create_solutions_silent_params()
                                         throws org.openrdf.query.MalformedQueryException,
                                                TokenMgrError,
                                                ParseException
        Example of a CREATE using a triples block to provision the named solution set. 
         create silent solutions %solutionSet {
    hint:Query hint:engine "cache" .
    hint:Query hint:expireAge "100000"^^ .
 }
        TODO Test to verify that we reject variables in the triples template (ground triples only). TODO Maybe specify the implementation class for the persistence?
        Throws:
        org.openrdf.query.MalformedQueryException
        TokenMgrError
        ParseException
